Title: The Well
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Matthew Negrete
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: Carol and Morgan are brought to a community called the Kingdom, led by the eccentric King Ezekiel.
